summary:
Hello.

I am a highly skilled and experienced full stack developer with over 10 years of experience in the IT engineering. 

I am proficient in React, Angular, and Vue.js, and I have a proven track record of building responsive and user-friendly websites using CMS(WordPress, Drupal), and some others. I am also proficient in PHP, Laravel, Node.js, and Express.js, also I have experience working with MySQL and MongoDB databases.

I was responsible for developing and maintaining several websites so far, and I also worked on a number of projects to improve the user experience, such as implementing a new search functionality and redesigning the homepage. I am a highly motivated and results-oriented developer who is always looking for new challenges.

Especially, EZSportsRP was my love - I have made it from scratch, and updating it nowadays for the new season with modern frameworks and environment.

I am spending most of time for work, and music etc, and it is my pleasure and trying to make satisfications from my customers always!

Hope good luck any time!

profile_positions.description:
Developed and maintained web applications using React, Angular, and Vue.js,
resulting in a 20% increase in page load speed and a 15% improvement in
overall performance.

Collaborated closely with designers and backend developers to translate
design concepts and business requirements into functional, user-friendly
applications, resulting in a 30% reduction in development time.

Implemented responsive designs and optimized front-end performance by
leveraging best practices such as code splitting, lazy loading, and caching,
resulting in a 25% increase in mobile responsiveness.

Integrated third-party APIs, such as payment gateways and social media
platforms, to enhance application functionality and user experience, resulting
in a 5% increase in payment success rate and a 10% increase in social media
engagement.

Conducted thorough code reviews, debugging, and testing, resulting in a 30%
reduction in the number of bugs and improved code quality.

Actively participated in the deployment and maintenance of applications on
cloud platforms like AWS and Heroku, ensuring smooth operations and
scalability, resulting in a 50% decrease in application downtime.
profile_positions.title: Full Stack Developer

profile_positions.description: EZSportsRP is a project that allows coaches/referees/players to get stats from their games, and I have made this system from scratch myself and I was the Project Manager. At first I used Angular/CodeIgniter, but now I'm converting this to React/Laravel since they are modern than original. When the new version is upgraded, users can use this website more efficiently than now.
profile_positions.title: Full Stack Engineer

profile_positions.description:
I'm a highly efficient and reliable professional with strong skill set in web and blockchain development and IOT engineering industry.
I have experience in building these type of websites and blockchain project.
-Marketplace and eCommerce.
-Dating and social.
-Personal portfolio.
-Complex Web Scraping
-NFT Marketplace.
-Sniper bot and trading bot.
-Smart contract of business level.
-IOT Firmware and AWS-IOT core Deploy.

My main technical Stacks.
-Frontend Stack (Html,CSS,SVG,BootStrap)
-Javascript/TypeScript,React.js/Next.js,Express.js,Three.js
-MongoDB,GraphQL,MySQL
-PHP,Laravel,WordPress,WebSocket
-Python,Django,Micropython,C++,C#,Solidity,Harcall
-Ethres.js,Web3.js
-Moralis Framework,Alchemy Framework
-Solana Stack, Polygon Stack
-MicroControllers applicaiton (PIC,ATmega,STM32,ESP series)

And I m crazy on challenging work that can consume my passion.

I looking forward to providing you a high quality solution .
profile_positions.title: Freelance Software Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Led in developing 3 tools that became the foundation for the intersection between Web3 and FinTech.

Implemented Breed smart contracts by adding a particular hash system,attracting 5% more clients than the previous quarter.

Coordinated with the team to create a NFT item marketplace in anAgile/Scrum environment, increasing development speed and quality by 20%.

Guided 2 junior developers to create a structured staking platform by usingweb3 tech.

Collaborated closely with clients to understand their requirements, provide technical insights, and deliver tailored solutions, resulting in a 90% client satisfaction rate.

Designed and optimized databases, including complex queries and data models, to ensure efficient data storage and retrieval, resulting in a 25% improvement in database performance.

15% improvement in code quality.

Designed and maintained databases, including schema design and optimization, to ensure efficient data storage and retrieval, resulting in a 25% increase in database query performance.
